data.name: Build Prerequisites
data.description: This script is designed to handle the installation of various software dependencies across different Linux distributions

entries.name: Arch Server Setup
entries.description: This command installs a minimal arch server setup under 5 minutes.

entries.name: Paru AUR Helper
entries.description:
Paru is your standard pacman wrapping AUR helper with lots of features and minimal interaction.
To know more about AUR helpers visit: https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/AUR_helpers

entries.name: Yay AUR Helper

Yet Another Yogurt - An AUR Helper Written in Go.
